name: K, OS
description:
A colorful adventure where you choose what shall (not) be sent, deciding the fate of your own God.

As a worker inside a computer RAM your task is to deliver the messages the Operating System (OS) requires. But deep within these packets lies a terrible truth. Will you decide to follow along and deliver the words you carry? Or will you stray from the path you were given and change the world for the better... or the worse?

The truth is out there. Go get it!

PD: Half an hour after submission I found a game-breaking bug with an easy fix. Other members of the team haven't experienced it. Either way, I provide a link to a patched version of the game for those with that problem:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EPQ5Y-XxsEFE07AsO9QKJJwsdQvR1Q_A/view?usp=shari...
